search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Personio (personio.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Personio is: [https://www.personio.com/pricing](https://www.personio.com/pricing).

Tailor your subscription
------------------------

Our most popular apps

#### Recruiting

Recruit smarter by attracting the right talent, selecting, and onboarding from one tool.

[Take a look](https://www.personio.com/product/recruiting/)

#### Surveys

Gather timely feedback, improve engagement, and share valuable employee insights.

[Take a look](https://www.personio.com/product/surveys/)

#### Performance & development

Create a culture of high performers with structured and thoughtful performance reviews.

[Take a look](https://www.personio.com/product/performance/)

#### Workforce planning

Easily plan for your evolving workforce in one connected tool.

[Take a look](https://www.personio.com/product/workforceplanning/)

#### Compensation management

Make compensation reviews easier and more fair with salary bands, performance data, and built in guidelines.

[Take a look](https://www.personio.com/product/compensation-management/)

#### HR help desk

Handle routine and complex questions with HR support available 24/7.

[Take a look](https://www.personio.com/conversations/)

Stay compliant & supported

#### Whistleblowing

Provide a dedicated, anonymous reporting channel for your employees.

[Take a look](https://www.personio.com/product/whistleblowing/)

#### Premium Support

Additional account owners and a sandbox environment.

[Take a look](https://www.personio.com/premium-support/)

#### Xero Integration

Effortlessly transfer payroll related data from Personio to Xero.

[Take a look](https://www.marketplace.personio.com/integrations/xero/)

PRODUCT AND BILLING

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

#### How much does Personio cost?

Our pricing depends on several factors, including the number of employees at your company and whether you choose to add any extra features (or "Apps") to your package.

We're confident you'll see a quick return on your investment — in fact, the majority of customers see that return within one year.

To get a custom quote, [book a demo](https://www.personio.com/webdemo/) with one of our product experts who can help tailor your package to your needs.

#### What company size does Personio cater for?

Personio is suitable for companies with 10-2,000 employees. Check out our [case studies](https://www.personio.com/references/) to see some of our current clients in your region and industry.

#### What are “Apps”?

Apps are what we call Personio’s extra features, available to complement our Core offering. We do also have a mobile app for using Personio on the go.

#### Does Personio integrate with other tools?

Yes, Personio offers over 200 integrations with popular apps such as Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Calendar, Zapier, Google SSO and more. [Check out our full list of integrations here](https://www.marketplace.personio.com/).

#### Is Personio suitable for international teams?

Yes. Personio works seamlessly for international organisations, wherever your teammates are around the world.

#### How long will my plan run?

For the yearly subscription, there is a minimum run-time of 12 months. Renewal is based on section 7 of our General Terms and Conditions [here](https://www.personio.com/terms/).

#### Are there any additional monthly costs on top of the monthly fee?

No, there are no other monthly costs on top of the basic fee. When you initially set up your account, there will be a one-time fee dependent on your company size. If you use job advertisement portals where a fee is charged, you can pay that fee directly through Personio and benefit from our special rates.

Customise your HR software plan to suit your organization’s needs. Unlock greater efficiency today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is customized based on company size and selected features. Discounts are available for annual upfront payments.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Everything you need for a foundation of HR excellence.
Limitless features of Core with advanced settings.

additional_fees.fee_description: One-time fee dependent on company size.
